name: OwnID Passwordless Login
author: OwnID

sections.description:
OwnID is a passwordless add-on for your WordPress or WooCommerce website. The authentication flow is web-based and doesn’t require you to install an app. Our complete end-to-end platform works cross-OS, cross-device, and cross-domain. It supports Passkeys out of the box.

Our plugin handles a multitude of login scenarios: new user login, existing user login, phone unavailable, biometrics not supported, and more. Your users will be able to log in quickly and easily, always.

CONFIGURATION STEPS

  1. Sign up to OwnID console.
  2. Select WordPress integration and complete your onboarding.
  3. Copy and paste the AppID and Shared Secret into OwnID WordPress plugin Settings.
  4. Enjoy your passwordless login! ðŸš€

DOCUMENTATION AND SUPPORT

  • For more information about our product, check out OwnID.
  • If you still have questions, ask us at contact@ownid.com

PRIVACY

OwnID does not store any user data and has no access to any biometric data.
sections.faq:
How does it work?

User identification is based on device-stored cryptographic keys protected with biometrics. (No phone number is required.)

Does OwnID support passkeys?

Yes.

Does the configuring of this plugin require any coding knowledge?

No. It’s a complete no-code integration and can be completed in minutes.

Does the plugin work with WooCommerce?

Yes, it works with WooCommerce login forms.

Do you support multiple languages?

We support over 30 languages. Our plugin automatically detects the language used in the website.
